channel.title: [Class suggestion] Bandit
channel.description:
>The bandit neutral offensive **Night ability: cut-purse** (3 uses) If the target has royal blood, gain 3 gold. They will lose their royal blood passive. **Night ability: rob(or mug)** (infinite uses) occupy the target. They will lose a use of the ability they tried to use if it has limited uses. If they did lose a use of an ability from this, gain 1 gold. **Day ability: burglarize** (2 uses) target will lose a use of each of their limited use abilities, and you will gain a gold for each ability you took a use from them of.
Goal: get 12 bars (not sure if 12 is to high or low, please suggest a different one if you like in the comments)
